NVIDIA | http://www.nvidia.com | Santa Clara, CA | Onsite | Senior C++ Developer

Our team is working on GPU cloud and virtualization, we are looking for C/C++ developers to work on Android, Windows, and MacOS. We are still a small team on a new product with lots of room to grow.

We use a good mix of low-level OS engineering, graphics, cross platform, and web technologies: C/C++, Python, Docker, Xen, AWS, Qt, Flask, SDL, OpenGL, DX, audio/video codecs, x86/ARM, Linux, Windows, MacOS, Android.

Contact: dschalig at nvidia.com
